chart_description: The User Groups Disk Writes chart shows the amount of data written to disk in kilobytes per second (KiB/s) by various user groups. This can help identify which user groups are using the most disk resources and potentially optimize their usage for better performance.

dimension_descriptions.997: The amount of data written to disk by user group 997.
dimension_descriptions.libvirt: The amount of data written to disk by user group libvirt.
dimension_descriptions.netdata: The amount of data written to disk by user group netdata.
dimension_descriptions.root: The amount of data written to disk by user group root.
dimension_descriptions.xfs: The amount of data written to disk by user group xfs.
